overview: This film makes a general survey of the Northern Territory of Australia and indicates its potential in regard to many already established industries. These include agriculture, mining, fisheries, cattle raising, pearling and the like. The Territory is still a land of many challenging problems; its greatest limiting factor being the lack of water. In recent years transportation has been improved  and education approached with vision and imagination. Housing is also being developed. Two thirds of the Territoryâ€™s work force is in Government employ.
title: The Living North
